column2: Shooting at Aventura Mall on Saturday afternoon (Miami)
column5: www.rawstory.com/â€¦  "Three people have been transported to area hospitals following a shooting at Aventura Mall on Saturday afternoon according to Miami-Dade Fire Rescue. The shooting took place at around 4 p.m. at the mall located in the 19500 block of Biscayne Blvd" CBS Miami reported.
